about_the_game:
Embark on a fantastical journey in "Col:Verse," a 2D top-down survival RPG set in a medieval game world. As an ordinary gamer unwittingly thrust into this alternate reality, your mission is clear: vanquish the enigmatic Writer controlling the game and return home. Explore sprawling landscapes, trade goods, and engage in epic battles against formidable bosses to level up and hone your skills.

But "Col:Verse" offers more than just combat and exploration. Encounter mythical creatures and converse with historical figures, delving into their lore and unraveling the secrets of their existence. From legendary beasts to renowned figures of history, each interaction provides insight into the rich tapestry of folklore and tradition.

Immerse yourself in a captivating blend of fantasy and education, as "Col:Verse" not only entertains but also educates, fostering an appreciation for cultural mythology and history among players young and old.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 ／ Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 560 with 4GB VRAM ／ NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti with 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 ／ Intel Core i7 8700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700 ／ NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Adventure that transports you to captivating realms, where you'll battle monsters, and solve mind-bending puzzles, journey of a regular gamer who stumbles upon a secret project, only to find himself trapped within the game world. Defeat the game and escape, or will you be forever lost in its depths?
